name: Spellcasting
effects: prepared spells: at level 1, prepare two level 1+ ranger spells
prepared spells: total prepared spells are shown on the class table
spell slots: per class table; regain all expended slots on a long rest
spellcasting focus: you can use a Druidic Focus
limits: prepared spell swap: on a long rest, replace prepared ranger spells with other ranger spells you can cast
prepared spells must be of a level for which you have spell slots
always prepared: spells from other ranger features are always prepared and don't count against prepared spells
notes: See chapter 7 for general spellcasting rules and the Ranger spell list in this chapter.
